column2: Mutungamiri weEquatorial Guinea, VaNguema, Votarisirwa Kusangana naVaMugabe
column3: Mutungamiri wenyika yeEquatorial Guinea VaTheodoro Obiang Nguema Mbasogo vakasangana nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa pavakazeya nyaya dzekusimbaradza kudyidyana pakati peZimbabwe nehurumende yekuMalabo. Vachitaura nevatori venhau paState House nezuro manheru mushure memusangano wavakaita nemutungamiri weEquatorial Guinea, VaTheodoro Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakati hapana zvitsva zvavakazeya naVaMbasogo munhaurirano dzavakaita kunze kwekungosimbaradza hukama hwagara huripo pakati peZimbabwe neEquatorial Guinea vasati vatora matomhu kubva kune vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. VaMbasogo vakaudzawo vatori venhau kuti kudyidzana pakati peZimbabwe nehurumende yavo kucharamba kuchienderera mberi zvisinei nekuti Zimbabwe yave nemutungamiri mutsva. VaMbasogo, avo vaitaura vachiturikirwa, vakati hurumende yavo iri kutsigira zvirongwa zviri kuitwa naVaMnangagwa zvakanangana nebudiriro yenyika. Vachiturikirwa, VaNguema vakati parwendo rwuno vakanga vasina zvitsva zvavakauya kuzotaura asi kungosimbaradza kudyidzana kwagara kwagara kuripo kuitira kuti vasimudzire nyika dzavo dzose dziri mbiri. Zvichakadai, VaMbasogo vakatarisirwa kuita musangano naVaMugabe, avo vavaidyidzana navo zvikuru vasati vatorerwa masimba ehutongi naVaMnangagwa zvakakonzera kuti pasave nekuwirana pakati paVaMugabe naVaMnangagwa. Musangano uyu wakatarisirwa kuitirwa kumba kwaVaMugabe kuBlue Roof kuBorrowdale mangwanani ano. Zvichakadai, vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika mukushanya kwemutungamiri weEquatorial Guinea vanoti VaMbasogo vatumwa nemashoko kuna VaMugabe abva kuna VaMnangagwa ane chekuita nekuti VaMugabe naVaMnangagwa vayanane pakubvutirana kwavakaita masimba. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaMalvern Mkudu, avo vanoshanda vakazvimirira, vanoti havaone VaMbasogo vachikwanisa kuita mutongi gava pakati pevaviri ava. VaMugabe naVaMbasogo vane hushamwari hunobvira kure uye VaMbasogo vakambobatsirwa naVaMugabe masoja emuno paakabata ndege yaiva nevanhu vainge vakatakura zvombo zvekunopidigurisa hurumende yaVaNguema kuMalabo. Izvi zvatsinhirwawo neimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda nesangano reRevolutionary Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaTjenesani Ntungagwa. Vapedza kusangana naVaMugabe, VaMbasogo vakatarisirwa kusangana zvakare naVaMnangagwa vasati vaoneka kudzokera kunyika kwavo nhasi wakare. Kupinda munyika kwakaita VaMbasogo nezuro kwakananganawo nekusvitsa chidimbu chepakati chegore kubva pakagadzwa VaMnangagwa semutungamiri wenyika munaMbudzi gore rapera. No media source currently available

column2: Vanhu Vokurudzirwa Kugwinyisa Muviri Kuti Vasarwarisa Vakabatwa neCovid-19
column3: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti vanhu vanofanirwa kugara vakagwinyisa miviri yavo nguva dzose kuitira kuti kana vachinge vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19, vave nemukana mukuru wekupora kubva kuchirwere ichi. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vagare vachiita zvirongwa zvekugwinyisa miviri yavo nguva dzose kuitira kuti vave nehutano hwakanaka. Kugwinyisa muviri uku kunogona kuitwa nenzira dzakawanda, idzo dzinosanganisira kuita zvemitambo, kumhanya, pamwe nekufamba zvinoitakuti vabude, unova mucherechedzo wekuti huwandu hwemafuta ari mumuviri, hunenge huchideredzwa. Mumwe mudzidzisi wepachikoro chemapusoro soro, Doctor Tendai Charity Nhenga, vanoti pavakarwara nedenda reCovid 19 gore rino, vakapiwa mubhedha kwaMutare uko kwavakaona vanhu vaiva vapihwawo mibhedha vakange vaine miviri yakakurisa zvikuru. Doctor Nhenga vanoti pavakaziva nezvedenda iri gore rakapera, vakatanga kuita zvokufamba vachigwinyisa muviri wavo. Vanoti vane chokwadi kuti kusimbisa kwavaiita nyama dzavo kwakabatsira zvikuru mukupora kwavo. Doctor Nhenga vanoti mudzinza ravo mune vanhu vane mhumhu mukuru, pamwe nehuremu husingawirirane nehurefu hwavo. Vanoti vazhinji vevanhu ava vanorwara nezvirwere zveshuga, High Blood Pressure izvo zvinoita kuti vadhererwe nezvirwere zvakawanda, zvinosanganisira Covid-19. Mukuru weDepartment of Chemical Pathology paUniversity of Zimbabwe School of Medicine, Muzvinafundo Hilda Matarira, vanoti veruzhinji vanofanirwa kugara vachigwinyisa miviri yavo kuburikidza nekuita mitambo kana mabasa anoita kuti vabude dikita. Muzvinafundo Matarira vanoti kubudisa dikita mumuviri kunoita kuti tsinga dzinoendesa mweya kumapapu, dzigare dzakavhurika. Muzvinafundo Matarira vanoti paongorora yavakaita kuEpworth nemuHarare, zvakaonekwa kuti vanhu ava vaisaziva kuti denda reCovid 19 rinokwanisa kuparadzirwawo nevanhu vasina zvinoratidza kuti vane denda iri, asi vainaro, izvo vanoti zviri kuita kuti denda iri ripararire zvakanyanyisa. Sangano reDiabetic Association of Zimbabwe rinoti nepamusana pekuti vanhu vakawanda havaongororwi chirwere cheshuga, ndizvo zviri kukwidzawo matenda emoyo, hupofu, nekugurwa kwemakumbo zvokuti Covid 19 ikabata vanhu vakadai vasiri kutora mishonga, inokwanisa kuvauraya. Ongororo yakaitwawo zvakare nebazi rezvehutano inoratidza kuti munhu mumwe chete kubva muvanhu gumi munyika, ane chirwere cheshuga. Mutevedzeri wemukuru anoona nazvematenda asingatapuriranwe mubazi rehutano, Dr Justice Mudavanhu, vanoti hurumende ine hurongwa hwekupinda munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana ichichenjedza veruzhinji pamusoro pechirwre cheshuga nokuti zvakaonekwa kuti vanhu vanonyanya kuvhiringwa nedenda reCovid 19, vanhu vane zvirwere zveshuga, High Blood Pressure, uye nguva zhinji, vari vanhu vanenge vasiri pamishonga. Asi Dr Madavanhu vanoti chirongwa ichi chakambomiswa nekuda kwemitemo yakatarwa nebazi rehutano iyo isingabvumidze kuungana kwevanhu munguva ino yekurwisa Covid 19.

column2: Ongororo Yoratidza Kuti Vanhu Vari Kutarisira Mutungamiri Anovawanisa Mabasa
column3: Ongororo yaitwa neAfrobarometer inoti rutsigiro rweveruzhinji kumutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, rwuri kudzikira kana zvichienzaniswa neimwe ongororo yavakaita masvondo mashoma adarika. Vachizivisa zvakabuda muongororo yavo, mukuru anoona nezvekutsvakiridza musangano reMass Public Opinion Institute iro rakaita tsvagiriridzo iyi richishanda nesangano reAfrobarometer Institute of Justice and Reconciliation, VaStephen Ndoma, vati huwandu hwevanhu vakati vachavotera VaMnangagwa musarudzo dzemwedzi uno hwaderera kubva pakaitwa ongororo yekutanga. Ongororo iyi inotiwo panyaya yevanhu vari kutarisira mukana wekuwana mabasa, vanhu vakawanda vanoti izvi zvinoitika chete kana mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, vari ivo vari panyanga. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo uye vachiwanzotaura vakarere kubatika reZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vati zvaburitswa neAfrobarometer zvinoratidza kuti VaMnangagwa vane rutsigiro kudarika mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaVivid Gwede, vati zvakabuda muongororo yeAfrobarometer iyi zvinoratidza kuti sarudzo dzemusi wa30 Chikunguru dzichapindwa rwepiri pakati paVaMnangagwa naVaChamisa. VaNdoma vati ongororo yavo yakabiritsawo zvakare kuti ruzhinji rwuri kutyira kuti vari muchiuto havazotambire zviri zveveruzhinji mushure mesarudzo. Vatiwo vakaona zvakare kuti vanhu vane chitsama havasi kuziva kuti magwaro anoratidza kuti munhu akanyoresa kuvhota haasi kuzoshandiswa musi wesarudzo uye vazhinji vakataurwa navo vakati vanotyawo mhirizhonga ine chekuita nesarudzo. No media source currently available

column2: Ndichiri kuzvinzwa: Duduza ‘. . . makore handiwo anotamba nhabvu’
column3: KAPUTENI weDynamos FC – Edward “Duduza” Sadomba – anoti makore handiwo anotamba nhabvu uye mwaka uno anoda kurakidza nyika yose kuti tarenda richirimo maari.   Duduza – uyo ane makore 35 okuberekwa – akakatyamadza vatsigiri venhabvu apo akazivisa kuti ave kudzoka kuzotambira DeMbare mushure mekunge apedza makore anodarika 10 achitamba bhora kunyika dzakasiyana dzinosanganisira Mozambique, Sudan, United Arab Emirates neLibya uko akakwanisa kuwana ruzivo rwakadzama rwemutambo uyu.   Achitaura neKwayedza pamusoro pekudzoka kwake kuDeMbare svondo rino, Duduza anoti makore handiwo  anotamba nhabvu.   Anoti mukana waakapihwa kuDynamos achaushandisa kurakidza vatsigiri venhabvu zvaaiita makore ese achitambira kunze kwenyika.   “Nhabvu haitambwe nemakore, tarisai vatambi vakaita saGianluigi Buffon weItaly ane makore 41 ekuberekwa asi nanhasi achiri kudhonza chete. Ini ndichiri kunzwa sekamwana kadiki uye ndiri kunzwa kuti zvichirimo.   “Zvinongodiwa kugona kuzvibata zvakanaka chete,” anodaro.   Chero zvazvo vatambi venhabvu makore ano kana vave nemakore 35 ekuberekwa vanenge vave kutarisirwa kunzi ndiyo nguva yavanosendeka shangu dzangu dzavo, Duduza anoti makumbo ake haasati aneta uye haazive kuti achazorega rinhi kutamba mutambo uyu.   “Chokwadi ndechekuti muviri wangu hausati waneta uye ndikatamba zvakanaka mwaka uno ndinofunga kuti ndinogona kuramba ndichidhonza kwemakore akawanda.   “Chikuru ndechekuti ndigadzirire zvakasimba kuti varairidzi vangu vandipe mukana wekuramba ndichitamba masvondo ese,” anodaro.   Svondo radarika, Duduza akarakidza kuti zvekutamba nhabvu hazvisati zvapera apo akanwisa mumutambo weCharity Challenge Cup pakati peDynamos neCAPS UNITED wakatambirwa kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium. Mumutambo uyu, DeMbare yakahwinha 2-0.   Akapedza mutambo wose achitemesa musoro vatambi veKepekepe izvo zvakarumbidzwa nevatsigiri vazhinji venhabvu vaimuona kekutanga achitambira DeMbare zvichitevera kudzoka kwaaita.   Duduza – uyo aive kuNorth Africa uko aitambira nhabvu kuzvikwata zvinosanganisira Al Hilal, Al Ahly nezvimwe –  anoti anoda kusimudzira vechidiki kuti vagosvika padanho raakasvika uye vagorarama hupenyu hwaari kurarama kuburikidza nenhabvu.   “Chandakaona mukufamba kwangu kwese kwandakaita nenhabvu ndechekuti kunze uko vanokoshesa mutambo uyu uye vanokoshesa basa ravo. Kana nguva yenhabvu yasvika vanoita zvenhabvu zvavanenge vachibhadharirwa kunzi vaite, havaite zvekutamba vanoita basa nemazvo.   “Ndinoda kupa ruzivo urwu kuvanin’ina vangu kuDynamos kuti vazive kuti kana vachida kusvika padanho randasvika vanotofanirwa kuzvishandira uye vashande nesimba,” anodaro.   Panguva yaaive kunze kwenyika, Duduza akambowana mukana wekutambira chikwata chemaWarriors asi haana kuzokwanisa kuenda kumitambo mikuru yakaita seAfrica Cup of Nations.   Anoti kudzoka kwake kuDynamos achashanda nesimba uye orakidza murairidzi wemaWarriors – Sunday ‘Mhofu’ Chidzambwa – kuti chipo chichiripo kuti agoshevedzwa muchikwata chichaenda kunokwikwidza kumakwishu eAfrica Cup of Nations kuEgypt.   Duduza ari kuedza kutevera matsimba evatambi vakaita saRoger Milla wekuCameroon uyo akanomirira nyika yake kumutambo weFIFA World Cup 1994 ave nemakore 42 ekuberekwa uye naEl Hadary wekuEgypt akakwanisawo kutambira nyika yake kumutambo we2018 World Cup kuRussia ane makore 45 ekuberekwa.   “Hapana mutambi wenhabvu asingade kumirira nyika yake, ini mukana uyu ukauya ndigafare chaizvo.   “Kana tikabudirira kuenda kumutambo weAfcon, ndingafare chaizvo kana ndikapihwa mukana naMhofu wekumirira nyika yangu,” anodaro Duduza.

column2: ZIBAWU Inoti Standard Bank Haina Chido cheKusimudzira Nyika
column3: Sangano rinomirira vashandi vemumabhanga, re Zimbabwe Banks and Allied Workers Union, rinoti Standard Bank iri kuvhara mabhanga ayo mumaguta madiki akaita se Hwange, Chiredzi, Chinhoyi nemamwe, nekuti bhanga iri haridi kubatsira Zimbabwe kuti ibudirire. Mashoko aya anotevera mashoko ebhanga iri ekuti riri kuvhara mabhanga aro mumaguta madiki nekuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzehupfumi. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Banks and Allied Workers Union, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti vashandi vavo vakawanda vari kurasikirwa nemabasa nepamusoro pemaitiro ebhanga iri. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reStandard Bank. No media source currently available

column2: VaMugabe Votanga Kutsvaga Rutsigiro Asi Vamwe Vachitya Kudzoka kweMhirizhonga
column3: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, nemusi weChishanu vari kutarisirwa kuparura hurongwa hwekutsvaga rutsigiro musarudzo dzegore rinouya vachikurudzira vechidiki kuti vaende kunonyoresa kuvhota. Musangano wekutanga pamisangano gumi ichaitwa naVaMugabe mumatunhu ose uri kutanga kuRudhaka Stadium, Marondera. Rwendo rwaVaMugabe urwu rwuri kuuyawo mushure mekunge mutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa reMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vatendererawo mumatunhu ose enyika vachiita misangano nevatsigiri vavo. Vamwe vari kuitawo misangano yakadai ndiAmai Joice Mujuru webato reNational People’s Party. Asi kutanga kwekutsvaga rutsigiro uku kunonzi nesangano rinoita zveongororo reAfrobarometer kuri kukonzera kuti vanhu vakawanda munyika vabatwe nekutya kukuru nenyaya yemhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika. Afrobarometer inotiwo huwandu hwevanhu vari kuti havachina chivimbo nesarudzo hurikuramba huchikwira. Nhengo yeMDC-T vachimirira Mkoba mudare reparamende, VaAmos Chibaya, vanoti ichokwadi kuti Zanu-PF iri kukonzera mhirizhonga nekuti haina chekuitira vanhu. Asi sachigaro weZanu-PF Youth League kuManicaland, VaMubuso Chinguno, vanoti muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi uye vanopikisa vanoreva nhema kuti bato ravo rinokurudzira mhirizhonga. No media source currently available

column2: ZCTU Yokurudzira Nhaurirano dzeMihoro Kuti Dziitwe Izvozvi
column3: Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vari kukurudzira makambani ose kuti atange misangano nemasangano evashandi vachikurukura nyaya dzemihoro. Kurudziro yaVaMoyo inotevera kusawirirana pakati pehurumende, ZCTU nesangano revashandirwi reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, Emcoz, panyaya yekuti Tripartite Negotiating Forum itare mari inotambirwa nemushandi wepasi pasi kana kuti minimum wage. Asi VaMoyo vanoti kukwira kuri kuita mitengo yezvinhu kwave kupa kuti ZCTU ide kuti paitwe nhaurirano dzechimbi chimbi dzekugadzirisa nyaya dzemari yemihoro. No media source currently available Asi mutungamiri weEmcoz, Doctor Israel Murefu, vanoti mitengo iri kukwira hongu asi zvinogona kusaramba zvakadaro nekupindana kwenguva. No media source currently available

column2: Morocco yatevera Senegal ku’Round of 16′
column3: MOROCCO nhasi manheru ano yatevera Senegal panyika dzemuAfrica kupinda mu’Round of 16′ zvichitevera kukunda kwayaita Canada 2-1 mumutambo we2022 FIFA World Cup iyo iri kutambirwa kuQatar.   MaAtlas Lions ange ari muGroup F umo akasangana neCroatian, Belgium neCanada.   Mumutambo wekutanga, Morocco yakaita mangange 0-0 neCroatia, ndokuzokunda Belgium 2-0 uye Canada iyo yayaradzika 2-1 ndokupedza iine zvibodzwa zvipfumbabwe.   Yabva yaita nhoroondo yekupedza iri pamusoro peGroup F ndokubva yanyora nhoroondo yekuita chikwata chega chemuAfrica chekupedza chiri pamusoro muboka rayo uye chisina kumbokundwa mumitambo kana mumwe chete.   Iye zvino MaAtlas Lions amirira kuona kuti achasangana nechikwata chipi kuRound of 16.

column2: Vakapotsa Vafa neCovid-19 Voyambira Vanhu Kuti Vabayiwe Nhomba Nguva Ichiripo
column3: Vamwe vanhu vakarwara nechirwere cheCovid-19 vasina kubayiwa nhomba vari kukurudzira vari kuzengurira kubayiwa kuti vaite izvi nekuti vakapotsa vaenda kwamupfiganebwe. Vaimbova mupurisa muZimbabwe Republic Police VaMalvern Mudyiwa mumwe akapona nepaburI retsono mushure mekubatwa nechirwere ichi vasina kunge vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19. VaMudyiwa vanoti vakatozonoponera kuchipatara cheParktowen uko vakange vopihwa mweya wekufema kwemavhiki matatu sezvo vainge vozarirwa uye vagarawo vaine chirwere cheasthma. VaMudyiwa vaendera mberi vachiti vakashamiswa apo vakapedza kugeza vakatarisa pachiringiro vakaona mufananidzo wavo wairatidza kuti vainge vasara mapfupa chete. Vamwe vakataura neStudio 7 ndiAmai Namatirai Mutemwa vanogara kuZambia vakabatwa neCovid-19 vagara vaine chirwere chemoyo. Vanoti kunyangwe vakaburitswa muchipatara vachiri kunetseka nekufema uye vakanzi nachiremba vavo kana vave nani vabayiwe nhomba yeCovid-19. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare kuTynwald North VaProvidence Moyo vanoti vakabhadhara mari yakawanda zvikuru kuti varapwe chirwere ichi vari kumba kwavo. Vanoti chirwere chavasiya vasinganyatsogone kumira kwenguva yakareba zvekuti kuti vaende kuri kubayiwa nhomba kune vanhu vakawanda zvinovanetsa. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano avo varikuita ongororo yemishonga yeCovid19 Muzvare Miriam Chemhanza vanoti vakabayiwa nhomba vakatapurirwa chirwere ichi havazonyanye kurwara sevasina. Nyanzvi munayay dzezvehutano Dr Tinashe Gede vakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vabaiwe nhomba yeCovid 19 uye kuti vasateerera zvinobuda pamadandemutande zvisingabvi kunyanzvi dzehutano pamusoro penhomba dze Covid-19 sezvo vanhu vakawanda vari kupedzisira vapinda muna taisireva. Vaendera mberi vachiti panguva ino yeCovid-19, chakakosha kubaiwa nhomba yechirwere ichi nekutevedzera kurudziro yeWorld Health Organisation yekuti vanhu vapfeke mamasiki, vageze mawoko uye vagare vakataramukana kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire. Pane gwaro rakaburitswawo nehurumende rinonzi “Covid 19 Admissions and Community Deaths by Vaccination Status,” riri kutsinhirawo kuti vanhu vari kufa zvakanyanya nechirwere cheCovid 19 vanhu vasina kubaiwa nhomba. Gwaro iri rinotiwo vana vadiki vave kunyanya kubatwawo nemhando yeCovid-19 iri kutenderera munyika yeDelta variant. No media source currently available

column2: South Africa Inoti Vabvakure Vachabaiwavo Nhomba yeCovid-19
column3: Hurumende yeSouth Africa yakazivisa kuti vanhu vese vari mu South Africa vachakwanisa kubaiwa mushonga wenhomba, kana kuti vaccine, wekudzivirira chirwere che Covid-19. Izvi zvinotevera gurukota reSouth Africa rinoona nezvehutano, VaZweli Mkhize, vazivisa kuti South Africa ichangobaya mushonga uyu pazvizvarwa zveSouth Africa chete, kwete vabvakure. Mushure mekushorwa zvikuru nenyanzvi dzezvehutano nemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, vakazivisa neMuvhuro kuti vanhu vakuru vose vari munyika iyi vachabaiywa mushonga uyu zvisinei kuti zvizvarwa zvekunyika ipi. Sangano reHuman Rights Watch, iro rakashoravo zvikuru hurumende yeSouth Africa payakange yataura zvekusarura vabvakure mukudzivirira chirwere ichi, rinoti izvi ndizvo zvinotarisirwa kuitwa munyika dzose, kusanganisa muSouth Africa. Mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kwe Africa, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti sezvo South Africa ine mbiri yekusarura vabvakure, sangano ravo richange rakatarisisa kuona kuti South Africa inoita here kana kuti kwete, zvayavimbisa kuita izvi. No media source currently available

column2: Vanamazvikokota Votarisa Pachena Vane Dambudziko reMwoyo kuChinhoyi
column3: Vamwe vanhu vari kurwara nezvirwere zvemoyo vari kufarira chirongwa chekuvhenekwa pasina muripo navana mazvikokota vezvirwere zvemoyo avo vari kubatsira varwere ava pachipatara chikuru chemuChinhoyi. Vanhu vakawanda vari kufara nechirongwa ichi, icho china chiremba vatatu vanobva ku Italy. Vana chiremba ava vari kutarisa zvikonzero zviri kuita kuti vanhu varware nemoyo vachivaendesa kunana chiremba vepamusoro soro kuti vanorapwa mushure mekuvhenekwa dzambudziko rinenge riripo. Mumwe wevatariswa nana chiremba ava, ndiVaPeter Phiri avo vabva kuMasvingo. VaPhiri\nvanoti vanzi moyo wavo unotoda kuvhiyiwa kunze kwenyika sezvo pasina vanachiremba vanogona kuvhiya nekugadzirisa mavharuvhu ari pamoyo pavo ayo anonzi akakanganisika. VaPhiri vanoti vanzi nyika iri pedyo inokwanisa kuvhiya moyo pasina dambudziko iSouth Africa kana kuenda kuIndia kana kuItaly. VaPhiri vanoti iye zvino zvave nani nekuti vave kuziva zviri kudikanwa. Mumwe avhenekwa akawanikwa moyo wake uzere mvura ndiVaCainos Beremauro avo vanzi vaende kuchipatara chikuru chemuHarare cheParirenyatwa kuti vanobviswa mvura yakawandisa mumoyo. VaBeremauro vanoti chirongwa chekutarisa moyo chiri kuyamura sezvo kuvhenekwa kwavayamura kuti vazive dambudziko ravanaro. Vanhu vari kurapwa vari kuita mutsetse wakakura paimba yekuvhekwa havasi kufara nevashandi vepachipatara ichi avo vari kupinza hama dzavo mberi idzo dzinenge dzanonoka kubva kumba. Mumwe murwere anonetsekana nemoyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita anoti huori haupere munyika sezvo hwatekeshera nemuzvipatara. Chirongwa chekuvheneka varwere vemoyo chatanga neMuvhuro uye chichapera neChishanu svondo rino. Mukuru wepachipara chikuru chemuChinhoyi, Supt Collet Mawire, vanoti vari kutarisira kuvhenekwa vanhu vanosvika makumi maviri pazuva vachibatsirwa nana chiremba vatatu. No media source currently available

column2: Magweta eVeritas Anoti ZEC Inofanira Kuudza Mapato Anopikisa Ari Kudhinda Magwaro ekuVhotesa
column3: Magweta anoshanda nesangano reVeritas iro rinoongorora mitemo inenge iri mudare reparamende anoti bumbiro remutemo rinosungira sangano rinoona nezvesarudzo reZimbabwe electoral commission kuti risume mapato anopikisa kuti magwaro ekuvhotesa kana kuti maballot papers ari kudhindwa kupi kuti nyaya dzesarudzo munyika dzisaite mutauro. ZEC inoti sezvo nguva yekuita sarudzo yave pedyo, yave kutsvaga vanodhinda mapepa aya nechimbi chimbi. Asi vanopikisa vange vachiti vanoda kuti zviitwe pajekerere pachikokwa makambani akawanda kuti sarudzo dzisabirirwe. Mutemo unosungirawo ZEC kuti isume mapato ari kukwikwidza huwandu hwemapepa anenge adhindwa uye anenge aendeswa kunzvimbo yose yekuvhotera. Veritas inoti hapana chinokanganisa ZEC kuti izivise vanopikisa kuti kambani yavakasarudza kudhidha mapepa ndeipi uye kukoka a nhumwa kunoona kunenge kudindwa mapepa acho. Mutungamiri wenyika vaemmerson mnangagwa vave kutarisirwa chero nguva kudoma zuva resarudzo sezvo senate iri kutarisirwa svondo rino kutambira bhiri rekuvandudza mitemo yesarudzo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehumhizha mumichina yekuvhotesa kana kuti BVR Doctor Samuel Chindaro vanoti kubirira sarudzo dzeBVR kunogona kuti netsei asi mitemo inodzikwa nemapato inogona kukanganisa jekerere musarudzo. No media source currently available

column2: Vagari Voita Maonero Akasiyana Pane Zviri Kuitika muBulawayo
column3: Vagari vemuBulawayo vari kuita maonero akasiyana siyana panyaya yezviri kuitika mukanzuru yeguta reBulawayo, vamwe vachiti zviri kukonzerwa nehuwori, vamwe vachiti zviri kukonzerwa nerusarura rudzi. Mutauro unotyisa wakasimudza musoro zvichitevera danho rakatorwa nemutevedzeri wameya weguta iri, VaTinashe Kambarami, rekumisa basa munyori weguta, VaChristopher Dube, masvondo mashoma apfuura vachivapomera mhosva dzakati kuti. Izvi zvakapa kuti vamwe vatsigira vaVaDube, vabude pachena vachishora VaKambarami, vamwe vachiti sezvo VaKambarami vari muShona, vaifanirwa kubva mukanzuru yeguta, vachiti verudzi rweNdebele chete ndivo vanofanira kupinda mukanzuru iyi. Izvi zvakaita kuti zvinhu zvishate vanhu vakawanda vachisimudzira nyaya yerusarura rudzi, asi vamwe vachiti dambudziko reguta raikonzerwa nehuori huri mukanzuru. Meya weguta, VaSolomon Mguni, vakazopindira vachimisa kumiswa basa kwaVaDube, asi vakati nyaya iri kupomerwa VaDube inofanirwa kuferefetwa nemazvo. Mutungamiri wesangano reHabakkuk Trust, iro rinoshanda mukuvaka runyararo muvanhu, VaDumisani Nkomo, vanoti vanobvumirana nemaonero ekuti nyaya yerusarurarudzi yakasimudzwa nemakakatanwa aya, ine chekuita nekusagadziriswa zvizere kwenyaya yeGukurahundi, uyewo kusarira kumashure kunonzi kwakaita matunhu eMatabeleland. Mudzidzisi wezvekuvakwa kwerunyararo nebudiriro, VaDonwell Dube, vachitaura semuongorori akazvimirira, vanoti panoda kunyatsoitwa tsvakurudzo yakakwana yekuti makakatanwa ari kuitika aya, ari kunyatsokonzerwa nei, vachitiwo nhoroondo yekuve nezvichemo zvisingagadziriswi nehurumende, zvinhu zvinogona kuve zvimwe zvezvikonzero. Munguva pfupi yapfuura, boka remadzimai eMDC emudunhu reBulawayo, rakashora kwarakati kukurudzirwa kwekupesana kwevanhu pachishandiswa marudzi kuri kuitwa muguta iri. Mukuru weAffirmative Action Group muBulawayo, VaReginald Shoko, vanoti sangano ravo rave nenguva richitaura nezvehuwori hwavanoti hwave nenguva huchiitika. Asi VaShoko vanoti vanoshora zvikuru nyaya yekupatsanurwa kwemarudzi. Mufundisi, uye vari mukuru wechikwata chinonzi Save Bulawayo Campaign, icho chakaita musangano nezuro waikurudzira kuti makanzura eBulawayo abviswe, kugadzwe komishini, VaAnglistone Sibanda, vanoti havakurudziri nyaya yerusarurarudzi. Mukuru weBulawayo Progressive Residents Association, VaAmbrose Sibindi, vanotiwo zviri kuitika mukanzuru yeBulawayo hazvinei nerusarurarudzi, asi kuti huwori uri pachena. VaSibindi vanoti zvakakosha kuti makanzuru asati asarudzwa, vave vanhu vanoziikanwa hunhu hwavo munzvimbo dzavanogara. VaSibindi vanotiwo zvakakosha kuti vagari vasarudze zvine huchenjeri makanzura avo kuitira kudzivirira huwori, kana kutadza kuita basa nemazvo. Vanhu vane chitsama vakataura pamusangano wanezuro vakaratidzawo kusafara nekutadza kuita basa nemazvo kuri kuitwa nekanzuru iyi, izvo vakati zviri kukonzerwa nehuwori. Mumwe mugari akangozvidoma nezita rekuti Amai Moyo vakati vanoda kuti pave nekomishini vachiti pave nenguva yakareba makanzura eguta reBulawayo achinongedzwa munyaya dzehuwori. Vakambove mutevedzeri wameya weBulawayo, VaGift Banda, vakambomiswa basa vachinenedzerwa huwori, asi vakazochenurwa nedare reHigh Court. Vaimbove murwiri wehondo yerusununguko pasi peboka reZIPRA, VaLinganiso Nyathi, vanoti nyaya yehuwori haifanirwi kuve inopinza zverusarurarudzi mukati. Vachinyora paTwitter, mumwe wevatevedzeri veMDC, VaWelshman Ncube, vayambira vagari vemuBulawayo kuti vasaite pfungwa yekuda kuve nekomisheni muguta, vachiti izvi zvinogona kudzorera kumashure budiriro yeguta. Svondo rapera, hurumende yakatumira komisheni yevanhu vashanu kuti iite ongororo yezviri kuitika mukanzuru yeBulawayo. Komisheni iyi yakapedza basa rayo nezuro uye zvakabuda zvinotarisirwa kuturwa munguva pfupi inotevera. Nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo emaguta dzinoti kuuyiswa kwekomisheni kuti ifambise mabasa eguta reBulawayo, zvakafanana nekuisa kanzuru iyi mumaoko eZanu PF sezvakamboitika munguva yevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, avo vakadoma makomisheni ekuti aiite basa mumaknzuru aive pasi peMDC mushure mekunze makanzuru aya apomerwa nyaya dzehuori. No media source currently available

column2: Dynamos Yotatsurana neFC Platinum Mumutambo Wakakosha weCastle Premier Soccer League
column3: Dyanamos iyo ine gakava mumba mayo iri kutarisirwa kutamba nechikwata chiri kutungamira gungano reCastle Premier Soccer Leagur cheFC Platinum mumutambo wakatarisirwa neveruzhinji munyika neMugovera. Nhengo yeDynamos Supporters Association Muzvare Judith Nyatsanza vanoti vateveri vechikwata ichi vanofanira kubatana vakananga kuZvishavane kuti vanokunda FC Platinum. Chikwata ichi chirikubaka moto nekudzima zvekuti vateveri vavo havasisina chivimbo nechikwata chavo mumitambo mitanhatu yasara. Muongorori wezvemitambo VaDannyboy Muneri vanoti vachitarisa matambiro anga achiita zvikwata izvi Kugona Kunenge Kudada iri kukunda. VaMuneri vanofembera zvibodzwa zvavanofunga kuti FC Platinum inokunda nazvo. Chikwata chiri pachidanho chechitatu Highlanders chiri pamusha neMutare City Rovers apo Caps United iri pamusha zvekare neTsholotsho Pirates. Mutare City Rovers irikusangana ne Ngezi Platinum Stars panguva iyo Triangle ine Chapungu. ZPC Kariba ichatamba neHarare City Chicken Inn ichivhara musangano neNgezi Platinum Stars

column2: Mbappe haasi kuzouya: Guardiola
column3: anoramba mashoko ekuti chikwata chake chiri kuda kubhadhara mari inosvika 200 miriyoni paunzi kuti chitenge mutambi weParis Saint-Germain, Kylian Mbappe, muna Ndira wegore rinotevera.   Zvakabuda mumapepanhau kuti City ichada kuendera mutambi uyu wekuFrance, uye PSG ichidawo kutengesa vatambi kuti mabhuku ayo azadzikise zvinodiwa nemitemo yefinancial fair play.   Asi, zviri kunzi Guardiola kuti atenge mutambi uyu, chikwata chake chinofanirwa kutanga chatengesa mumwe mutambi nekuda kwemitemo iyi uye Raheem Sterling ndiye ari kutaurwa kunzi anogona kutengeswa.   Achitaura svondo rino – vasati vasangana neHoffenheim mumutambo weChampions League – Guardiola akaudza vatori venhau kuti hapana apo chikwata chake pachichaendera mutambi uyu uyo akahwina mukombe weWorld Cup.   “Hazvisi kuzoitika,” anodaro.   “Dzimwe dzenguva handinzwisise kuti nyaya idzi dziri kubva kupi chaizvo.” – Sportsmail Football

column2: Nyaya yeMureza weNyika Yokonzera Mutauro muDare reParamende
column3: Mureza weZimbabwe wakaunza kunetsana mudare reNational Assembly nemusi weChitatu mushure mekunge vange vakabata chinzvimbo chemutauriri wedare iri Amai MArble Chinomona vakaedza kudzinga mudare nhengo mbiri dzeMDC T idzo dzakapinda mudare dzakasungira mureza. Nhengo idzi VaTrevor Saruwaka, naVaGodfrey Sithole dzakaramba kubuda uye dzakabva dzatanga kutambidza vamwe vadzo mureza uyu izvo zvakaita kuti basa rimbomiswa mudare iri. Mureza wenyika wave kufarirwa pamwe nekupfekwa nevakawanda munyika zvichitevera chirongwa chamufundisi Evan Mawarire cheHash Tag This Flag icho chinokurudzira mutungamiriri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe kuti vaite zvavakavimbisa musarudzo nyika musarudzo dza2013 zvekupa vanhu mabasa, kumisa huori uye kugadzirisa hupfumi. Muchokoto watangwa nenhengo yedare iri yeZanu PF, VaOliver Mandipaka avo vakabvunza kuti sei VaSaruwaka NaVaSithole vainge vakasungira mireza muhuro asi dare iri rakapa mutongo neChipiri wekuti mureza uyu haufaniri kusungirwa mudare. Amai Chinomona vakabva vati nhengo dzeMDC T idzi dzibvise mureza asi vaviri avo vakaramba. Amai Chinomona vakabva vaudza mupurisa wedare iri kana kuti Segeant at Arms kuti vaburitse vaviri ava asi varamba kubva vatanga kutambidza mureza kune vamwe vavo. Mukuru wenhengo dzeMDC T mudare iri VaInnocent Gonese vati kusungira mureza kunoratidza kuti vanhu vari kufarira nyika yavo uye kuburitsa nhengo idzi mudare kunenge kuri kutyora kodzero dzavo. Asi Amai Chinomona vakaramba vakaomesa musoro. Mireza yakazobviswa mushure mekunge Amai Chinomona vati vaizomisa basa nhengo dzeparamende dzange dzichiramba kutevedza mutongo wavo. Zvichakadaro, makurukota ese ehurumende akatadza kuuya kuzopindura mibvunzo muparamende izvo zvakaita kuti nhengo dzeMDC dzipopote nekukumbira dare kuti rirange makurukota aya. VaGonese vakati yatova tsika yemakurukota aya yekusauuya kuparamende vakakurudzira kuti varangwe. Asi Amai Chinomona vati vange vaudzwa kuti makurukota aya ainge ari mumusangano wedare remakurukota nekudaro vatevedzeri vavo ndivo vange vakavamiririra. Mune imwewo nyaya, mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvevashandi, VaTapiwa Matangaidze, vasveveredzwa nenhengo dzeparamende kubva kumapato anopikisa mushure mekunge vataura kuti hurumende ichiri kukwanisa kubhadhara vashandi vayo. Vange vachipindura mubvunzo kubva kuna muzvare Jessie Majome veMDC T wekuti sei hurumende iri kutadza kubhadhara vashandi vayo paine nguva. VaMatangaidze vanoti vanoshamiswa nekuti mapato anopikisa ari kushushikana nemari dzevashandi vehurumende kudarika vashandi vacho pachavo. Asi Muzvare Majome nevamwe vavo vati zvinokonzera kuti vashushikane nekuti vanomirira vashandi ava munzvimbo dzavo. Mwedzi wapfuura hurumende yakatadza kubhadhara vashandi vayo uye vakatozotambira mihoro yemwedzi wapera mwedzi uno. Mwedzi uno, hurumende haisati yabhadhara vashandi uye haisati yataura kuti vachatambira rini. No media source currently available

column2: Vadhomeni Vanoti Hurumende Haisi Kukoshesa Mabasa Avo
column3: Sangano rinomirira vanoshanda mubazi rezvekurima, re Zimbabwe Agricultural Professionals and Technical Association (ZAPTA), rinoti vashandi vebazi iri, zvikuru sei vadhomeni, vanofanirwa kupiwa mari yerubatsiro, kana kuti ‘risk allowance’, panguva ino yekurwisana necoronavirus sezvo basa ravo richivamanikidza kusangana nekushanda nevanhu vakasiyana siyana. Munyori mukuru weZAPTA, VaZivaishe Zhou, vaudza Studio 7 kuti sezvo hurumende yakapa varairidzi mari yekubatsirikana panguva iyi, haifanirwi kusarudza vashandi vainobatsira, naizvozvo hurumende inofanirwa kuziva kuti vadhomeni vanodavo rubatsiro rwakadai. VaZhou vati sangano ravo harisikufara nemabatirwo arikuitwa nyaya yezvimidhudhudhu zvinofanirwa kushandiswa nevadhomeni, vachiti vadhomeni vazhinji vari kushaya mari yokuenda kumahofisi eCMED kunotora zvimidhudhudhu izvi. VaZhou vati pane zvizhinji zvinofanirwa kugadziriswa mubazi iri, vachiti vanokurudzira hurumende kuti itarisise nekugadzirisa zvirikuitika mubazi iri kuti vashandi vaite basa ravo zvakanaka. Tatadza kubata mukuru anoona nezvevashandi mubazi iri, VaGibson Chijarira, sezvo mharembozha yavo yange isingadavirwi. Tichienda pamhepo, gurukota rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yatavatumira. No media source currently available

column2: Nyanzvi dzeHutano Dzoshushikaka neMadzimai Ari Kufa Achisununguka Vana
column3: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kuyambira kuti chirwere cheCovid-19 chinogona kunge chapa kuti huwandu hwemadzimai ari kufa achisungunuka huti wedzerei. Ongororo yakaitwa nebazi reUnited Nations rinoona nezvevana reUNICEF muna 2019, inoratidza kuti madzimai mazana mana nemakumi matanhatu kana kuti 462 pamadzimai zviuru zana kana kuti 100 000 vanofa vachisungunuka muZimbabwe. Huwandu uhu hwange hwakati derere pane madzimai mazana matanhatu negumi nevana kana kuti 624 vaifa vachisungunuka pamadzimai zviuru zana kana kuti 100 000 muna 2017. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzemadzimai reWomen’s Action Group, Amai Edna Masiiwa, vanoti huwandu hwemadzimai ari kufa achisungunuka hwakaderera asi kufa kwemudzimai kana mumwe chete kunoshungurudza. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kugara kure nezvipatara kunopa kuti hupenyu hwemadzimai huve munjodzi sezvo vachizosvika pakuda kusungunuka vasati vavhenekwa nachiremba sezvinokurudzirwa. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Tonotenda Michael Simemeza vatiwo zvimwe zvinokonzera kufa kwemadzimai zvinosanganisira denda remoyo uye zvimwe zvirwere zvinotapuriranwa pabonde. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano, Dr Josephat Chiripanyanga, vakurudzirawo zvakanyanya varume kuti vapote vacheperekedzana nemadzimai avo kuenda kumakiriniki kuti vanzwe zvinenge zvichitaurwa navanachiremba zvinozobatsira kuti madzimai asungunuke nyore. Vatiwo nekuda kwekupararira zvakanyanya kwechirwere cheCovid-19, hurumende dzakawanda kusanganisirawo yeZimbabwe hadzichakoshese hutano hwemadzimai akazvitakura nezvimwe zvirwere. Mukuyedza kubatsira madzimai akazvitakura munyika yeZimbabwe, sangano reUnited Nations Population Fund kana kuti UNFPA, rakanyorerana chibvumirano nenyika yeJapan chekubatsira nemari inosvika miriyoni imwechete nezviuru mazana matatatu emadhora ekuAmerica, kana kuti USD1,3 million. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano, vachishanda nesangano reUNFPA, Dr Edwin Mpeta vanoti chirongwa ichi chichabatsira zvipatara nemakiriniki zvemumaguta eHarare neBulawayo sezvo muri imo makaonekwa kuti mune madzimai akawanda ari kufa achisungunuka. Doctor Mpeta vanoti zvipatara nemakiriniki zvichatengerwa zvinoshandiswa pakubatsira madzimai akazvitakura uye nezvipfeko zvekudzivirira kutapuriranwa kweCovid 19 pakati pemadzimai akazvitakura nevakoti navanachiremba. UNFPA inoti pagore, madzimai zviuru gumi nezvishanu kana kuti 15, 000 vanosungunuka kuBulawayo ukuwo vamwe zviru makumi mana nevashanu kana kuti 45, 000 vachisungunuka muHarare. Pamadzimai ose aya, zviuru mapfumbamwe kana kuti 19, 000 vanoda kuvhiyiwa uye vachabatsirwa nemari yabva kuJapana iyi. No media source currently available

column2: Ndiyani Achatora Mukombe waSoccer Star Gore Rino
column3: Vasarudzi veCastle Soccer Star of the Year vaungana muHarare vachisarudza vatambi gumi nemumwe chete vari kurwira kutora mukombe mukuru uyu. Vatambi Ocean Mushure naChristian Epoupa veDynamos, Dominic Chungwa we Caps United, Rodwell Chinyengetere weFC Platinum naClement Matawu weChicken Inn - vapinda pavatambi gumi nemumwechete vari kurwira kutora mukombe weCastle Soccer Star of the Year wemwaka uno. NgezI Platinum Stars ndiyo ine vatambi vakawanda pavatambi vasarudzwa ava vanoti Terence Dzvukamanja, Tichaona Mabvura, na Quadr Amini. Vamwe vakwanisa kupinda pavatambi gumi nemumwechete ava ndiDominic Chungwa naDevon Chafa veCaps United. Chicken Inn ina Moses Jackson naClement Matawu uyo akaita mukurumbira achitambira Motor Action nekutora mukombe waSoccer Star uyu muna 2006. Soccer Stars of the Year pamwe nemurairidzi Coach of the Year, vachaziviswa pamwe nekupihwa mibairo yavo pamabiko ekupera kwegore achaitwa nevePremier Soccer League vakabatana nevanovapa mari veDelta Beverages. Norman Mapeza weFC Platinum,na Lloyd Mutasa weDynamos ndivo vari kutarisirwa kurwira mukombe weCoach of the Year. No media source currently available

column2: Zanu PF Yogadzirira Sarudzo Dzichaitwa Muna Kurume
column3: Bato reZanu PF nhasi ratanga kutambira magwaro evanhu vanoda kumirira bato iri musarudzo dze by-elections dzichaitwa muna Kurume. Asi Zanu PF inoti ichatanga yaita dzekutsvaga vachamirira bato iri musarudzo dzemun Kurume. Muchiziviso kunhengo dzebato ravo, murongi wemisangano muZanu PF, VaMike Bimha, vati Zanu PF ichapinda musarudzo dze by-elections nekudaro vese vanoda kumirira bato vanofanira kuendesa magwaro avo kumahofisi ebato iri mumatunhu avo. VaBimha vati izvi zvinofanira kuitwa kusvika mangwana nenguva dza4 masikati. Vati masichagaro ematunhu anofanira kuendesa mazita evanhu ava kumahofisi echikamu chebato ravo chekuronga musangano kana kuti Commissariat nemusi weMugovera masikati. VaBimha vati bato richazivisa mazita evanhu vanenge vabvumidzwa kuti vamirire bato uye kana pachinge paita vanhu vakawanda vanoda kumirira bato pachinzvimbo chimwe chete, pachaitwa sarudzo dzemaprimary musi wa20 Ndira. Zimbabwe Electoral Commission (ZEC) yakazivisa svondo rapfuura kuti vanoda kupinda musarudzo dze by-elections idzo dzichaitwa musi wa26 Kurume vanofanira kunyoresa kuZEC musi wa26 Ndira. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuna VaBimba sezvo vati vanga vasiri muhovisi. Mumwe wechidiki muZanu PF, VaMunashe Mututsa vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotambira chiziviso chebatoi ravo uye vechidiki vachaendesa magwaro avo kuti vapinde musarudzo. Bato reZapu razivisawo kuti richapinda musarudzo idzi nekuti zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vawane vatungamiriri vanovashandira. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaGift Ostallos Siziba, vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo ritori mushishi yekutsvaga vachamirira bato iri musarudzo dzichaitwa muna Kurume. Asi vati rwendo runo havasi kuita sarudzo dzemaprimary vachiti dzinopesanisa vanhu. Vati vanhu ndivo vanosarudza vanhu vavanoda kuti vavamirire kubva munzvimbo dzavanogara. Mutauriri weMDC-T VaWitness Dube vati vatove pedyo nekupedza kutsvaga vanhu vachamirira bato ravo musarudzo idzi. Asi kunyange hazvo mapato makuru munyika nemamwe ari kuita gadziriro yesarudzo idzi, bato idzva reIdeas Party for Democracy rinoti kupinda musarudzo idzi kutambisa nguva nemari. Mutungamiri webato iri, VaHebert Chamuka, vaudza vatori venhau kuti havasi kupinda musarudzo idzi vachiti vachapinda musarudzo dza2023. Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakatara 26 Kurume sezuva rekuita sarudzo dzekutsiva vanhu vakadzingwa kana kufa muparamende nemakanzuru. Pane zvigaro makumi maviri nezvisere muNational Assembly nezvigaro zana nezvinomwe zvemumakanzuru zvichakwikwidzwa musi wa26 Kurume. No media source currently available
